name: Sc0tb0t
description:
The Loch Ness Monster has grown sick of the constant stream of tourists visiting his beloved home. 

He has joined forces with other famous Scottish mythological terrors to drive the Scottish people from their homeland. 

In a last ditch attempt at survival the greatest Scottish scientific minds have joined forces to create Sc0tb0t. 

He is a plucky little robot with the agility needed to traverse the dangers ahead and rid Scotland of the foul beasts once and for all. 

This is no light task as Sc0tb0t must defeat the Selkie, the ScottishFaeries,  The Tatty Bogle and the Kelpie before he gets anywhere near Nessie! 

Only in the hands of the greatest gamer will Sc0tb0t survive! 

Do you think you have the skills? 

Time will tell... 

Good luck! 

Scotland is counting on you. 

This a a platform game for the ZX Spectrum which will run through any emulator.  (128k)

The loading screen is by the amazing pixel artist Andy Green. 

Collect the keys to open the doors and avoid all enemies to survive. 

There are 27 levels and 9 lives.

The keys are QAOP SPACE

Issues with sinclair controls fixed and an extra level has been added for Sc0tb0t v1.
